Anticipation

11 July 2010

We've been growing some vegetables in the garden.


And we're hoping they taste as good as the courgette flower looks.

I will miss this place; it has been very good to us.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
